name: Capture 40 Pro
description:
The most powerful AI engine!
The most amazing poker game!
This is a two-player card game integrated with competition and recreation.

Where Capture 40 Pro is a Paid version, Capture 40 Free and Capture 40 are free versions.

---------------------------------
How to play
---------------------------------
1) 5=5 points; 10=10 points; K=10 points; Others=0 points;
2) The Offender is to capture 40 points to become the Defender;
3) The Defender is to prevent it to Advance.

---------------------------------
Special skills
---------------------------------
1) Play multi-cards.
2) Play four-cards.

---------------------------------
Game Modes
---------------------------------
Single Player Mode (Play against CPU with powerful AI)

---------------------------------
Features of the application
---------------------------------
1) Support portrait orientation.
2) Support landscape orientation for zoom-in.
3) Support movable board for more functionality.
4) Automatically save game history for continuing play next time.
5) Be able to re-confirm cards that are previous played.
6) Automatically adjust time interval between two plays to ensure enough time to view.
7) Automatically adjust card scale to ensure clear view.
8) Automatically change button color and effects to help users to play.
9) Support multi-languages, including English, Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, French, German, Italian, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese.


---------------------------------
(Chinese)
---------------------------------
最強的人工智能! 最激勵的人機博弈!
這是一款集休閑與競技於一身的雙人撲克遊戲!

---------------------------------
如何玩
---------------------------------
1) 5=5 分; 10=10 分; K=10 分; 其他=0分;
2) 閑家抓分滿40分獲得坐莊;
3) 莊家逃分使閑家不滿40分獲得晉級。.

---------------------------------
特殊技巧提示
---------------------------------
1) 甩牌.
2) 4張.

---------------------------------
遊戲模式
---------------------------------
單人模式（和CPU對戰）

---------------------------------
軟件特點
---------------------------------
1)是為數不多的一款支持豎屏的撲克遊戲,打牌時更加自然。
2)支持橫屏,可以擴大顯示畫面,幫助看牌,
3)支持動屏,可以利用更多的擴展功能。
4)自動存儲打牌成績,支持下次延續打牌。
5)點擊最後一次出的牌可以補看漏看的牌。
6)自動調整打牌停留時間,保證看清牌。
7)自動調整紙牌大小,保證精力集中。
8)自動判斷桌面情況,通過圖片和按鍵的不同顯示來幫助用戶判斷和操作。
9)支持十一種語言,包括英文,中文,繁體中文,日語,法語,德語,意大利語,荷蘭語,俄語,西班牙,葡萄牙語。
